name: Woodland (thatsmaik)
description:
• Explore an ancient island and learn it's history
  • Discover secrets along your way
  • Bad-tempered crabs!
  • Find the sword, lantern, shovel and sacred glove of power
  • Find a way to escape the island
  • Make friends

It was made in 7 days while I was sick at home.  It's my first Playdate game and I'm curious how it plays on the console since I actually don't have one yet. I'm still waiting for it to ship. So really curious to get feedback if you find the time. :)

Music by @earl_chives <3
